projects.name: Library Management System
projects.description: A web application to manage inventory, loans, and returns in a library.

projects.name: Online Learning Platform
projects.description: A platform for students to access online courses, watch videos, take exams, and receive certificates.

projects.name: Habit Tracking Application
projects.description: A mobile application that helps users set and track their daily habits, set goals, and provide reminders.
